moves.1. e4 e5 2. d4 exd4 3. c3 dxc3 4. Bc4 cx: Okay. Not the sharpest. But then not the worst.
moves.6... d6: ? He returns the favor. Bb4! and black is the one making threats.
moves.7. Qb3: I jump on my opportunity to attack.
moves.8... fxe6 9. Qxe6+: My queen gets into the heart of black's camp.
moves.10. Qc8+: I happily get back my pawn.
moves.13... O-O: ?? Another bad move. *General rule of thumb. Never let a knight get on the e6 square when there isn't a good way to get rid of it.*
moves.15. Nxc7: The donkey forks Queen and Rook again.
moves.16. Qxa8 Qxc7 17. Rc1: Only way to save my queen. He just disconnected. After ...Qa5, Qc6 I have an overwhelming advantage.
